column5: Looking for a good a lake in eastern Ontario preferably with in 2-3 hrs of us border at interstate 81. Taking father inlaw and his buddy pike fishing, we are just amateurs looking at catching pike in good numbers at nice size rather than the monsters. I'am trying to find a spot that the two of them can have good fishing while they can still get around fairly decent. Thanks in advance.
There are quite few lakes within that drive of the US border. Big Rideau lakeÂ & Charleston Lake are both within an hour of the border and offer good pike fishing along with bass & Lake Trout!
never heard of interstate 81...which border crossing is this?
Why not just fish the Thousand Islands? For numbers of decent-sized fish, it has some of the best pike fishing in Ontario hands-down.
